amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of section 303 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 which requires that alternative fueled vehicles be acquired by the Federal government for the Federal fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available by the act from being used in contravention of Section 303 of the Environmental Protection Act of 1992.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Engel.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
